about_the_game: "Descend into a chilling adventure with this first-person indie horror shooter. In this game, you take control of a protagonist who must navigate a haunted building, using an elevator to move between floors. Each floor presents unique and challenging puzzles that you must solve to proceed to the next level. But the building is not empty—undead enemies lurk in the shadows, ready to attack at any moment. To survive, you must manage your resources, solve puzzles quickly, and keep an eye on the timer. If the timer reaches zero, your fate is sealed. Experience the tension and terror as you uncover the secrets hidden within each floor."

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

detailed_description: "Descend into a chilling adventure with this first-person indie horror shooter. In this game, you take control of a protagonist who must navigate a haunted building, using an elevator to move between floors. Each floor presents unique and challenging puzzles that you must solve to proceed to the next level. But the building is not empty—undead enemies lurk in the shadows, ready to attack at any moment. To survive, you must manage your resources, solve puzzles quickly, and keep an eye on the timer. If the timer reaches zero, your fate is sealed. Experience the tension and terror as you uncover the secrets hidden within each floor."

name: Elevatrix

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5600XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: "A first-person indie horror shooter where players solve puzzles on each floor of a haunted building, all while surviving attacks from the undead and racing against the clock."
